body:
<!--- Remove sections that do not apply -->

This issue tracker is only for technical issues related to bitcoin-core.

General bitcoin questions and/or support requests and are best directed to the [Bitcoin StackExchange](https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com).

For reporting security issues, please read instructions at [https://bitcoincore.org/en/contact/](https://bitcoincore.org/en/contact/).

### Describe the issue
Bitcoin Core crashes when it launches.
### Can you reliably reproduce the issue?
#### If so, please list the steps to reproduce below:
1.Open bitcoin core
2.It Crashes

### Expected behaviour
It should have opened to the normal bitcoin core window.

### Actual behaviour
It stops responding and doesn't respond again.

### Screenshots.
![crash](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/27851824/26233897/412e54a0-3c26-11e7-8759-030f3090d62b.PNG)

### What version of bitcoin-core are you using?
0.14.0

### Machine specs:
- OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro (Windows 10)
- CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3930K CPU @ 3.20GHz, 3201 Mhz, 6 Core(s), 12 Logical Processor(s)
- RAM: 16 GB
- Disk size: 479 GB
- Disk Type (HD/SDD): I do not know

### Any extra information that might be useful in the debugging process.
title: Cannot Launch Bitcoin Core
